channel.title: Reinforcement Learning on AICube.FUN
channel.description: Recent content in Reinforcement Learning on AICube.FUN

item.title: Training an AI to Bowl in Unity
item.description: In this experiment, a reinforcement learning algorithm called PPO was used to train an AI agent to bowl in the Unity game engine. The Goal The goal was to create an AI that could knock down bowling pins efficiently by throwing the ball straight down the lane.
